name: Reverse-Vine®
description: Reverse-Vine® is a proprietary extract from a blend of red wine, grape cluster stems, and grapevine. This age defying extract contains naturally occuring Trans-Resveratrol, OPC's, Polyphenols, and the newly discovered Trans-e-Viniferin only found in the grapevine. Our key advantage is our exclusive extraction purification technology process to extract Trans-e-Viniferin and other important nutrients. This process produces highly concentrated molecules for optimum utilization to help reduce cell-oxidation.
